participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Sofia enjoys exploring different cultures through language and music.
participant_1.background: My favorite Spanish word is trabajo. I also study languages. My next language to study is French. I am a musician. One of the languages that I am currently studying is Spanish.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, Jason often thinks about his life choices and expresses a desire to learn and grow.
participant_2.background: I feel old. I am currently in a juvenile detention center. My mom is coming to visit me tomorrow. I will be released in about a month. I'm here for shoplifting.
